text: Suffolk County is a county in the U.S. state of New York. It lies in central and eastern Long Island and makes up most of the island's territory, and is bordered by Nassau County to the west. In 2020, 1,525,920 people lived there. The county seat is Riverhead. == Communities == Suffolk County is split into ten towns: * Babylon * Brookhaven * East Hampton * Huntington * Islip * Riverhead * Shelter Island * Smithtown * Southampton * Southold == References == Category:New York (state) counties
title: Suffolk County, New York
